ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:14:58 [Issue ID 4000-836244] urn:comicvine:4000-836244
ComicInfo.Summary:
Having been tried in absentia by the Vampiri state, Vampirella’s mother Lilith’s conviction on sedition charges is a done deal by the time she finally arrives on her home world. Can Vampi allow her mother’s execution, or will she again risk banishment from Drakulon by coming to Lilith’s rescue?
